subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Up to 80 messages every 3 hours on GPT-4o; higher limits on GPT-4
Access via ChatGPT Plus, with usage limits lower than for GPT-4o
5x more usage than free tier, with capacity to create more projects and chats
Access to 1.5 Pro and other models within Google One AI Premium

copilot_pro.description: Individual subscription for priority access to latest models, accelerated performance during peak times, and use in Microsoft 365 apps (Word, Excel, etc.).

microsoft_365_copilot.description: Enterprise subscription integrated into the M365 suite, featuring business data security and context.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: Estimated at 15-20% for power users, driven by products like ChatGPT Plus and Claude Pro.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price compression in 2024, especially for smaller, faster models. Flagship models are becoming more cost-competitive, blurring the lines with mid-tier options. A hybrid strategy with low-cost 'flash/haiku' models for simple tasks and powerful 'sonnet/pro' models for complex tasks is emerging. Open-source models hosted on cloud platforms are a major driver of this downward pricing pressure.
